title: Plat player looking for OOL team
body:
can play any role but support. Currently plat 3 but I have been low diamond.

Please add me if you wish to try me out.

Cheers

IGN: Scrawny

replies.body:
hi 
im looking for a OOL team as well
midlane main was diamond on euw last season.
tell me if u want to make a team

oh hey ,
i main support more than 3 years and i played with challenger diamond teams , so i have the experience to play in OOL if anyone looking for support you can message me if you want thanks
